msg_confirm_delete_named_entity: Are you sure you want to delete {entity} {name}?
msg_drop_widget: Drop a component here to add to this container
msg_confirm_delete_component: Are you sure you want to delete this component?
error_invalid_page_path: Path can only contain alphanumeric characters.
msg_delete_current_page_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete current page? This operation cannot be undone.
msg_site_metadata_success: Site metadata saved. Please refresh browser window to see your changes.
error_site_exists: Site with the same name exists.
msg_reset_password_info: Enter you email or screen name and click Send Code. We will send you the code to the email associated with your account.
msg_registration_code: Please enter the registration code sent to your email and a few additional items to complete your registration.
msg_resent_code: We have resent your code. Please check your SPAM folder if you don't see it in your inbox.
msg_have_registration_code: I already have a registration code
msg_agree_to_tou: By checking this box I agree to abide by the Terms of Use.
msg_must_agree_to_tou: You must agree to our Terms of Use by checking the box.
msg_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and must contain at least 1 uppercase, 1 number, and 1 special character.
msg_accept_tou_lead: Please read the Terms of Use carefully, you may have to scroll to see all of the terms. By clicking the button below, you are accepting the Terms of Use for this Website.
msg_discard_edits_question: Are you sure you want to discard current edits?
msg_access_denied: Sorry! You are not authorized for this action.
msg_work_saved_in_outbox: Your work has been saved in the outbox.
error_internal: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try your request at a later time.
error_generic: Sorry! There was a problem processing your request.
error_no_connection: Failed to connect to our servers. Please check your Wi-Fi or cellular data settings for this app.
error_page_not_found: You are trying to view a non-existent or un-authorized page.
error_please_correct_errors: Please fix highlighted errors and try again.
error_failed_to_logout: Sorry! Could not log you out.
error_account_not_found: Sorry! We could not find a matching user account.
error_enter_email_or_screen_name: Please enter email or screen name
error_enter_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
error_problem_with_login: Sorry! There was a problem logging you in.
error_too_many_login_attempts: Your account has been locked due to too many failed login attempts. Please reset your password to continue.
error_new_passwords_cannot_be_same_as_ol: New password cannot be the same as the old password.
error_email_or_screen_name_is_required: You must provide your screen name or email.
error_multi_select_required: Please select at least one option.
error_must_be_float: Please enter a floating point value.
error_value_cannot_be_less_than: Please enter a number greater than or equal to {limit}
error_value_cannot_be_greater_than: Please enter a number less than or equal to {limit}
error_login_required: You must be logged in to complete this request.
error_avatar_upload_failed: Sorry! Failed to upload your avatar image.
msg_upload_avatar_instructions: Select an image file (PNG, JPEG, GIF) and click on "Upload Avatar" button to set your avatar.
